radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse hypoattenuation of the subcortical white matter of the frontal, parietal, and temporal lobes as well as the thalami, midbrain, and pons regions.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A repeat MRI brain demonstrated extensive non-enhancing white matter signal abnormalities. Follow-up MRI brain scans done three and nine months following his initial presentation revealed an interval decrease in abnormal signal change.
